transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haan namashkar sir, dedh baje bole the sir aapne call karne ke liye.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan boliye.

Executive: Haan ji sir, ye main link share kar raha hu aap se join kar lijiye video meet ka.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Video meet ka link share kar raha hu join kar lijiye sir.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Aap kaun bol rahe ho?

Executive: Haan ji sir boliye.

Customer: Aap kaun bol rahe ho?

Executive: Aapki aawaz kat rahi hai main aapko call back karta hu sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was expecting a call at 1:30.

- Customer wants to know who is speaking.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a video meet link.

- Executive said he will call back due to voice breaking.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, video meet, link
